fund: Name of the private‐equity or investment fund to which the cash-flow entry relates.
transaction_type: Category of cash movement (e.g., Capital Call, Distribution, Recallable Distribution) indicating the nature of the entry.
no: Internal reference or document identifier for the specific cash-flow event (e.g., CC#1).
document_date: Date shown on the official notice or document that initiated the cash-flow event.
trans_date: Actual settlement date on which the cash was received or paid.
year: Fiscal year to which the transaction is attributed (stored as the first day of that year).
project: Name of the underlying portfolio company or project associated with the transaction.
portfolio_investment: Portion of the transaction amount allocated to direct portfolio investments (recorded as a string due to formatting with commas).
mgmt_fee: Dollar amount of management fees included in the cash-flow event.
partnership_exp: Amount classified as partnership operating expenses in the transaction.
org_fee: Organizational or formation fee charged in connection with the cash-flow event.
others: Miscellaneous amounts that do not fall into the predefined expense categories.
trans_amt: Total net amount of the cash-flow transaction (negative for capital calls, positive for distributions).
cum_capital_called: Cumulative capital that has been called from investors up to and including this transaction.
remaining_callable_capital: Unfunded commitment still available to be called from investors after this transaction.
distributions: Gross distribution amount paid out to investors in this transaction.
cum_dist_before_carry: Total distributions to investors before deducting carried interest, aggregated to date.
carry_interest: Carried interest allocated to the general partner for this transaction.
carried_interest_received_as_co_gp: Carried interest actually received by the co-general partner in this transaction.
withholding_tax: Amount of withholding tax deducted from the distribution.
recycled_amount: Portion of a prior distribution that is recalled (recycled) as new callable capital.
distributions_after_carried: Net distribution to limited partners after deducting carried interest for this transaction.
cum_dist_after_carry: Cumulative net distributions to investors after carried interest up to this point.
capital_account_balance: Investor’s ending capital account balance following this transaction.
notes: Free-text comments or explanations related to the cash-flow entry.
